product_name: CamelBak Arete 18 Hydration Pack - 70 fl. oz.
long_description: Serving double duty as a hydration daypack or as a reservoir sleeve in a larger pack, the CamelBak Arete 18 Hydration Pack hauls 70 fl. oz. of water, plus your essentials for a day in the wilderness. Turn the Arete 18 inside out and it transforms into a a reservoir sleeve that can be placed inside a larger pack for multiday adventures. 70 fl. oz. Antidote(TM) reservoir features a welded center baffle and low-profile shape for stability. Wide-mouth port cuts weight and makes it easy to fill and clean the reservoir; quick-snap cap tightens in just a quarter turn. Quick Link(TM) system lets you effortlessly add accessories such as a Fresh(TM) filter, insulated tube, tube director or flow meter (accessories sold separately). Hydration compartment loads easily, holding the reservoir flat against your back to leave more room for gear. Breathable back panel features upper pods that articulate for maximum comfort and superior ventilation, while lower pod provides load transfer. The CamelBak Arete 18 Hydration Pack is assembled in the U.S. of domestic and imported components.
short_description: Serving double duty as a hydration daypack or as a reservoir sleeve in a larger pack, the CamelBak Arete 18 Hydration Pack hauls 70 fl. oz. of water, plus your essentials for a day in the wilderness.
